main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Williamstown, West Virginia, on October 19, 1967, for a duration of 40 seconds.
interesting points: The object had a horseshoe shape with red and green lights along its wings., The observer heard a deep jet sound as the object hovered overhead., The reported altitude was approximately 35-40 miles., The object performed a semi-circle maneuver before disappearing behind a hill., There was one other witness to the sighting who was driving at the time.
witness description: One witness was in a car and the other was not identified.
